Remember that the most beautiful things in the world are the most useless; peacocks and lilies for instance.
John Ruskin, The Stones of Venice

Each thumbnail here is actually a gallery, so you can click on any of them to see more photos from the same date. I've even added little blurbs to each gallery. Have fun.

I shoot on a Canon EOS Rebel T2i and edit with darktable.
